text: Bradford High School is a public high school in Bradford, Ohio. It is the only high school in the Bradford Exempted Village Schools district. Bradford's fight song is sung to the march, "Our Director." ==See also== * N.M.A.M. Institute of Technology ==References== ==External links== * District Website Category:High schools in Darke County, Ohio Category:Public high schools in Ohio
title: Bradford High School (Ohio)
